is an island off the coast of
. The waters of the island form part of a protected marine reserve.
There is a ferry that leaves from Santa Pola every hour
The closest airport to Tabarca is the Alicante Airport
The island has no automobiles, and the only way of getting around is by foot. However, this does not pose a problem, as walking around the whole island does not take more than 3 hours.

value: content=This house is for rent at a reasonable price. Short term and long term prices are available. It is a gorgeous 3 bedroom house. The door opens onto a plaza and then right to the sea. Also it is right next to the most popular beach on the island, as well as some of the more secluded ones. From the balcony on the first bedroom you can see the sea, and you can see the coast of Alicante for miles from the solarium.
